title: Chairman Gilani welcomes Chinese business delegation to Senate
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani on Friday warmly welcomed a Chinese business delegation to the Upper House of Pakistan’s Parliament, reaffirming Pakistan’s commitment to further strengthening economic and strategic ties with China.
The delegation observed the proceedings of the Senate and was acknowledged by the Chairman during the session.
The visit of Chinese investors was a step forward in deepening bilateral economic cooperation, especially in sectors like infrastructure, energy, technology, and trade.
